nodes.text: The Skraj'Tais or "Skyland" was a space station orbiting the planet Coyn that functioned as a large spaceport. The station was capable of hosting hundreds of ships at a time and was similar in design to Kwenn Space Station. It was the major starport for those who had no business on Coyn itself and was the most likely refueling and servicing destination for those just passing through the system.
